reviewText: I have purchased a number of abs dvd's and this one is now my favorite. There are two different exercises, each which lasts for 20 minutes. One is for flattening and the other is for toning. I am a man and I use this. She has an excellent pacing voice in teaching the classes. There are 3 women of different levels so don't be intimidated. Even more, when you look at her, she looks really fabulous for someone who is clearly dare I say 40+
summary: I wish I had discovered Pilates earlier in life.
Title: N/A

reviewText: The moves are fine but my wife and I found it hard to follow the pace and understand the instruction. It's not even that rigorous , but the camera jumps back and forth too much. There are three women doing the moves at different difficulty levels as Mari explains the sequence. If you're a beginner trying to learn it is hard to follow because the camera never stops for very long on the woman performing in the beginner positions.I would recommend trying these DVD's instead.:10 Minute Solution: Rapid Results PilatesLara Hudson,orElement: Pilates Weight Loss for BeginnersBrooke Siler
Title: N/A

reviewText: You can feel it working the first time you play it. It's got a good pace and helps you to feel great.
Title: N/A

reviewText: The only disappointing thing is that both exercises have a lot of the same moves, all the "lower body" exercises are the same so I didn't feel I was getting two different workouts.
Title: N/A

reviewText: In my opinion Mari Winsor does the best workout Pilates DVDs.  Her DVDs are easy to follow with one instructor doing the beginner's movements and one for the more advanced.  You'll feel tighter abs after two weeks from doing this DVD only 3 times a week.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I love this one it's a little more fast paced and very effective. I have all of Mari Winsor pilates and I want her to come out with some advanced ones where she just goes for it fast paced without explaining the moves. This workout combined with a cardio workout is awesome. I see such a difference in my core and my husband noticed. This workout is great if you have back issues.
Title: N/A
